name: Gateway of India
description: An iconic monument in Mumbai, overlooking the Arabian Sea.

name: Ajanta and Ellora Caves
description: UNESCO World Heritage sites known for their ancient rock-cut temples and intricate carvings.

name: Mahabaleshwar
description: A scenic hill station known for its strawberry farms, viewpoints, and pleasant weather.

name: Shirdi
description: A pilgrimage town known for the Sai Baba Temple, attracting millions of devotees every year.

name: Lonavala
description: A popular hill station near Mumbai, known for its picturesque landscapes and chikki (sweet snack).
